description: Use this module for power management

name.description: Hostname or ip address of the BMC.

state.type: Enum["on -- Request system turn on", "off -- Request system turn off without waiting for OS to shutdown", "shutdown -- Have system request OS proper shutdown", "reset -- Request system reset without waiting for OS", "boot -- If system is off, then 'on', else 'reset'"]
state.description: Whether to ensure that the machine in desired state.

user.description: Username to use to connect to the BMC.

timeout.description: Maximum number of seconds before interrupt request.

password.description: Password to connect to the BMC.
